attributes.action: Hold a Referendum on abandoning 2030 and 2050 and EV's
attributes.additional_details: Taking into account the damage EVs and the like are doing to the earth (remember little children are dying in Africa etc. to get lithium)  and the long term damage they will continue to do, given that the truth is constantly being covered up by governments worldwide who are only listening to people with a vested interest. We would like the government to ask two questions: Firstly, should the UK government abandon the 2030 and 2050 targets and Secondly, should we abandon ICE cars in favour of EVs
attributes.background: The matter of 2030 and 2050 should not be resolved by ANY UK government, this is something that affects everybody in all walks of life and we the people should have a say on the matter especially as NO major party differs on what is frankly a lie.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
